message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you given its worth of $8000 to you. Considering its unique features and high quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a great deal while allowing me to fairly compensate for the product's true worth. I look forward to your positive response.
